titleInfo.title: 'File K/13 Papers Regarding Nationality of `Abdullah ibn Ahmad ibn `Abd al-Rahman Al Bin `Ali'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 17; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 4-13; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled. A previous foliation sequence, which is present between ff 4-16 and is also circled, has been superseded and therefore crossed out.

mods.abstract: This file contains exchanges of letters regarding the disputed nationality of Abdullah bin Ahmed Al Bin 'Ali. Of note are letters from the governor of the Eastern Province of Saudi Arabia, Ibn Jiluwi, and the Political Agency, claiming Al Bin 'Ali as a subject of the Al Saud.
